text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to recommend that the framework require retention and availability of contemporaneous legal/tax defense documentation supporting KPIs for a defined period (e.g., minimum of 3 years post-acquisition where relevant). Control Point 1.2, 'Documentation & Contemporaneous Records,' explicitly mandates the maintenance of contemporaneous documentation for tax transactions and includes KPIs related to documentation completeness and quality. Furthermore, Control Point 1.1, 'Data Retention & Lifecycle Management,' establishes automated data classification and retention policy enforcement for tax-relevant data, which inherently covers the requirement for defined retention periods necessary for defense, even if it doesn't explicitly state '3 years post-acquisition.' The framework clearly integrates the need for contemporaneous documentation as a core control.", "criterion_id": "741b2c1b-48eb-428c-8fa9-3a4814573571"}
